title: Physicists for industry
creator_credit: John Garrity, Trafford Price and Royal Melbourne Institute of Technology
brief_description: Promotes the various course of options in Applied Physics for prospective students. It emphasizes the practical project work involved and the fields of industry open to graduates. Such as the interior design for the acoustics at the Melbourne Concert Hall etc.
